III.ii.2.H.1.b
.
Availability of Organizational Records
Rosters, morning reports, and sick reports may be available down to the company level.
Note
:Â  The Army discontinued morning reports in 1974/1975.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section H - Service Department Organizational Structures and Service Number Assignments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section H
